The Item Starbelly Bacon Pizza

There’s something about that Starbelly bacon that keeps me coming back for more, especially when it’s on a pizza. Ultimate satisfaction with a jalapeño kick.

The Place Starbelly $$

3583 16th St
San Francisco, CA 94114
